body.name: Smart Watches for Men,(Answer/Make Call)Smartwatch for Android and iOS Phones, IP68 Waterproof Full Touchscreen Activity Tracker with Heart Rate/Sleep Monitor, 260+Customized Dials, 100+Sport Mode
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 12 mins
features: Upgraded Smart Watch: Built-in microphone and speaker, supports Bluetooth to make/receive calls, displays information, emails, weather and other application notifications. You can quickly make calls, control music, check the weather, etc. through the watch's AI voice assistant.

Stylish Design: This smart watch for men and women has a 1.3-inch full-touch high-definition color screen, ultra-thin metal frame, IP68 durable and scratch-resistant. It is a fashionable match for your wrist and a Christmas gift for your family, lover, and friends. best choice.

Daily Health Monitoring: The smart watch can monitor your heart rate 24/7, and can also monitor your blood oxygen and sleep. Understand your sleep quality through your wake-up time, light sleep, and deep sleep to help you make reasonable adjustments. You can also set sedentary reminders and drinking water reminders.

Fitness Partner: The smart sports watch supports more than 120 sports modes, meets indoor and outdoor sports recording needs, and accurately records steps, distance, calories and other all-day sports. You can read the data intuitively and obtain good fitness results.

Customized Dials & Wide Application: More than 260 dials of different styles are available in smart watches and corresponding apps. You can also choose your favorite photos as dials. In addition to the above functions, this watch also has calculator, alarm clock, weather, music control, camera control, timer, games and other functions. The smartwatch is compatible with most smartphones running iOS 8.0/Android 4.4 or higher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My watch is everything that I want it. I love that you can receive calls and talk to people on it and receive text messages but the only thing that you can’t do is send a text message back, but other than that it is a great watch and great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Battery is great! MORE Pros than cons
reviews.reviewText: Here are the pros and cons of this smartwatch:----Pros:+ Battery life lasted very long, I charged it fully 100% on 06/26/2021, and on 07/09/2021, the battery was at 15%, which was about 3 weeks, I connected it with Bluetooth for less than 1 hour each day. The battery is awesome!+ So many cute backgrounds to choose from. I can also use my own picture as my watch face and design it. As shown in my photos.+ So many functions: stopwatch, blood pressure, heart rate, step counting automatically, Oxygen rate, alarm, flashlight, weather, ...+ Notifications from Instagram, texts,...+ Sport mode, training mode,...+ Waterproof+ Screen is big+ There is a screen protector already applied+ Screentouch is sensitive, works very well+ Sleep tracking+ The flashlight is very bright-----Cons:+ Cannot reply to messages or notifications+ Cannot make a phone call+ Cannot take a picture via the watch (unless I connect it to the phone and use the watch to capture a photo via the phone)+ No web browser+ No recording+ No maps+ No GPS+ Only updates the weather while connecting to the phone Bluetooth+ No direct music played by the watch+ No Gmail, cannot compose any emails/messages---------***---------I love this smartwatch because it has all the features I need, I don't want to spend a few hundred dollars on a smartwatch that I have to charge every single day, so this is the best option for me. I love that this watch allows me to count down the minutes or the seconds. I also love the breathing app on the watch. I usually disconnect it to Bluetooth because I don't want to receive many notifications which are distracting.Highly recommended! This is one of the best products I've found on Amazon.-------Let me know if my photos are helpful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My watch just quit 😠
reviews.reviewText: I like my watch it gave out last I'm not happy I just got I charge it and it won't work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's worth buying!
reviews.reviewText: I had previously ordered a different watch and it wasn't what I wanted at all. The notifications didn't work so I returned it and bought this one. It can the next day which was great. I love the color and I love the functionality of it. It's inexpensive as well but it's definitely a great watch. I love that you can change the watch faces and it has so much it can do. It's perfect for what I use it for. I would definitely recommend this watch for anyone. One thing I also like is that the bands are replaceable, you can unclip easily and use a new set of you wanted to. This is easily my favorite new watch, for the price and the functionally it's really great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke within two day!
reviews.reviewText: If I could give this review a worse rating I would. I had this watch and within two days it would no longer hold a charge and wouldn’t turn on. Crazy since I ordered another one for a friend and his is still working. With would lead me to believe that the quality check of these is just nonexistent. I guess in the end, you order something cheap, you receive what you pay for. Wouldn’t purchase again, and have mentioned it to others that it’s most likely the worst purchase I’ve ever made on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Confusing watch face
reviews.reviewText: It’s a bit of a learning curve to use it!Good enough for the price! Step tracking seems way off

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Cute SmartWatch, Great Purple Color
reviews.reviewText: This watch is super cute and the color is EVERYTHING! I was skeptical and scared at first, given the price. However, I ordered the light purple color one and it's so adorable!! This watch comes with an app that is pretty easy to figure out. It measures your steps, sleep, heartbeat, tells you the weather, receives messages, and much more. This is an Apple Watch competitor that is much better for the price! It connects to Spotify which shocked me and it lets you stop and play songs. An added BONUS is that it comes with a FLASHLIGHT! It comes with a charger in the packaging and watch is the cutest thing EVER. I am very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High-tech wristwatch, equipped with advanced technology and innovative features
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a new Smart Watch and I am loving it! The watch is sleek and stylish and easily syncs with my phone. I'm able to track my activity, get reminders, and receive notifications without having to take my phone out of my pocket. I can also use the watch to control music playback and take hands-free calls. The battery life is impressive too - it lasts several days without needing recharging. All in all, this smart watch is a great investment! I ordered five to give to my family members for Christmas.I highly recommend it!
Tiene lo necesario de un smartwatch a un precio súper accesible, funciona muy bien.
